Summary: LIght beam, very powerfull and silent
divs: sighting details very shallow, powerful light beam of bluish color like when magnesium is put on fire. it was flying at 25 to 45 feet from the ground and was silent. the speed was around 25km\hr
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Laval
